**Example 1: 请求示例**



Input: 

```
tccli eiam DescribeUserGroup --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --UserGroupId 1453013c-d0e9-424b-b9c7-dabcea3bd0ca
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Description": "用户组的备注",
        "RequestId": "25c3e2d7-678f-4935-bbd4-5599e9794b62",
        "UserGroupId": "1453013c-d0e9-424b-b9c7-dabcea3bd0ca",
        "DisplayName": "用户组的名称"
    }
}
```
